get.summary: Gets a list of all countries.

post.summary: Gets recursiv customer messages for a portfolio, plant, subplant or device.
post.description:
This endpoint returns a limited list of customer messages recursive for a portfolio, plant, subplant or single device
in descending order from request property "from".
            
To fetch more items use the property marker of the last returned CustomerMessageResponse object. 
This marker can be passed as reference in the request property "marker". Both request properties "from" and
"marker" can not be passed at the same request, otherwise a 400 bad request will be returned.
            
The request property "componentId" addresses the root component (plant, subplant or device) and all underlying components of the request.
If "componentId" is null or empty, the customer messages of the the complete portfolio (user-dependend) and all underlying components will be returned as a limited list.

400.description: The request is not as expected

get.summary: Returns a list of available widget definitions for passed componentId.
get.description:
Returns a list of widget definitions, that are available for current user. A widget definition does not
contain data of the widget. Depend on the widget type (e.g. EnergyAndPower or Weather) the client has to
query further endpoints to collect the necessary data for the widget visualization. If parameter "componentId" is set, 
widgets related to this component (e.g. plant, device, subplant, etc.) will be returned, otherwise available 
widgets for all authorized components (Portfolio) will be returned.

parameters.name: componentId
parameters.description: The id of the component. Components are plants, plant-groups, devices and sub-plants.

400.description: The request is not as expected

get.summary: Gets device information for a specific device.
get.description: Returns a device by the device id.

get.summary: Gets devices of the plant and its subplants.
get.description: Returns a list of devices belongs to a specific plant. Assignments to subplants does not affect the result.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Optional query string. Return all devices with part name or serial matching the query string.

400.description: The request is not as expected

get.summary: Gets all devices in plant that are assignable to a subplant
get.description:
Returns a list of devices belongs to a specific plant. The result depends on the assignment to a subplant.
If a device is assignable to multiple subplants it is returned. If a device is assignable only to one subplant and already assigned, it is not part of the result.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Optional query string. Return all devices with part of name or serial matching the query string.

400.description: The request is not as expected

400.description: The request is not as expected

get.summary: Get Configurations for given ComponentId (SubPlant, Plant, PlantGrp etc.) and higher hierarchies.
get.description:
Get all notification Configurations, which are found for given componentId and all parentComponentIds (for example if component is a
subPlant, you will get alle notification configurations for the plant and all plantGrps the subPlant is in).
You need the privileges to view notification configurations for given componentId.

parameters.name: componentId
parameters.description: The component identifier for which this request is.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid componentId?)

post.summary: Creates a new notification configuration for the given user on the given componentId.
post.description:
The Notification will be marked for the given componentId, f.e. plant, plantgrp. The user will be the creator, but all people with
enough privileges on the componentId can see the configuration.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid componentId or body request)

get.summary: Get Configurations for logged In Users Portfolio.
get.description: Get all notification Configurations, which are found for given userId. This is equal to the users portfolio level.

post.summary: Creates a new notification configuration for the given users portfolio.
post.description:
The Notification will be marked for the given userId indicating that it is for the users portfolio. The user will be the creator, and all other users
cannot see the configuration.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid body request)

put.description:
Updates the given notification configuration (identified by configurationId) to the new values delivered in the body 
request object. ComponentId and UserId have to be valid and have to have enough privileges to do so.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid userId/componentId or invalid configurationId or invalid body request)

delete.description: Delete the given notification configuration (identified by configurationId). UserId and ComponentId have to be valid and have to have enough privileges to do so.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid userId/componentId or invalid configurationId or invalid body request)

put.description:
Updates the given notification configuration (identified by configurationId) to the new values delivered in the body 
request object. UserId has to be valid and has to have enough privileges to do so.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid userId or invalid configurationId or invalid body request)

delete.description: Delete the given notification configuration (identified by configurationId). UserId has to be valid and has to have enough privileges to do so.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid userId or invalid configurationId or invalid body request)

get.summary: Get all notification configuration templates.
get.description:
Will return all valid templates from which a notification configuration can be created.
Contains initial Information to give to the user.
Contains custom parameters which can be configured by the user. the TagId defines the text to be viewed,
the ParameterTemplateId defines which type of parameter it is.

get.summary: Get a notification configuration template.
get.description:
Will return the template with given templateId from which a notification configuration can be created.
Contains initial Information to give to the user.
Contains custom parameters which can be configured by the user. the TagId defines the text to be viewed,
the ParameterTemplateId defines which type of parameter it is.

400.description: The request is not as expected (invalid templateId?)

404.description: No Notification Template with this Id found

400.description: The request is not as expected

countryName.description: Gets or sets the country name in format ISO 3166 ALPHA-2.

countryName.description: Country where the company is located in format ISO 3166 ALPHA-2.

city.description: City where the company is located.

zipCode.description: Zip code of the city where the company is located.

street.description: Street where the company is located.

postOfficeBox.description: Post office box of the company.

taxIdNumber.description: Tax id number of the company.

businessPartnerId.description: Business partner id of the company.

ComponentResponse.description: Component response object. Component is e.g. a device, plant, subplant, etc.

componentTags.description: Defines the tags of the component, e.g. Pv, Battery, Generic, EnergyAndPowerOut, EnergyAndPowerInOut.

countryCode2.description: Gets the country code according to ISO3166 APLPHA-2.

countryCode3.description: Gets the country code according to ISO3166 APLPHA-3.

currencyCode3.description: Gets the ISO currency code according to ISO 4217.

componentId.description: The component id (e.g. deviceId, plantId, subPlantId) OR null for complete portfolio of the user

from.description: The from date time in utc. Messages will be returned in descending date order from this date time. If from is set, marker has not to be transfered.

marker.description: The marker of the message, where the fetching has to be proceed. If marker is set, from has not to be transfered.
Gets the unique marker of the message. This marker can be used to determine the starting position of the search.

deviceSerialnumber.description: Gets the serial number of the device.

deviceId.description: Gets or sets the device id.

plantId.description: Gets the plant id. Do not have to be displayed when requested component is a plant.

plantName.description: Gets the plant name. Do not have to be displayed when requested component is a plant.

messageTag.description: Gets the message tag. Represents the resource id for the message text.

eventTypeExtension.description: Gets the event type extension, e.g. none, incomming, outgoing.

messageGroupTag.description: Gets the message group tag. Has to be translated by the resources for the message groups.

position.description: The argument position in the resource text.

valueType.description: The type of the value, e.g. string, int, double, timestamp.

plantId.description: Gets or sets the plant id.

deviceId.description: Gets or sets the device id.

productGroupTagId.description: Gets the tag id of the product group

_links.description: Gets or sets the HATEOAS links for the current object

now.description: The response object for latest weather.

WeatherForecastLatestResponse.description: The weather forecast object for latest timestamp.

time.description: Utc timestamp of the returned weather.

iconId.description: Id of the weather icon. E.g. 2 = Cloudy, 61 = half rainy and half sunny. The corresponding night icon is 100 higher, e.g. 161 = half rainy and half clear sky.

WeatherForecastDayResponse.description: The weather forecast object for a whole day.

iconId.description: Id of the weather icon. E.g. 2 = Cloudy, 61 = half rainy and half sunny. The corresponding night icon is 100 higher, e.g. 161 = half rainy and half clear sky.

minTemperature.description: The minmum temperature of the day.

maxTemperature.description: The maximum temperature of the day.

activePowerRestriction.description: Gets or sets the active power restriction. This is the last value measured.

maximumPower.description: Gets or sets the maximum power.

timestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp of the last change of the restriction in UTC.

restrictionSource.description: Gets or sets the restriction source for the last change as TagId.

powerRestriction.description: Gets or sets the array of power restrictions in percent for the last 24 hours.

activePower.description: Gets or sets the array of power values in W for the last 24 hours.

dateTimeBegin.description: Begin time stamp of the measurement query (utc).

dateTimeEnd.description: End time stamp of the measurement query (utc).

componentId.description: Unique identifier of the component, e.g. plantId, deviceId, etc. Multiple components can be passed as comma-separated list.

resolution.description: Resolution of the interval (FiveMinutes, FifteenMinutes, OneHour, ThreeHours, SixHours, TwelveHours, OneDay, OneMonth, OneYear).

timezone.description: Gets or sets the timezone (IANA time tone id).

aggregate.description: Requested aggregation function (Sum, Avg, Min, Max, Last, Dif).

multiAggregate.description: Gets or sets the aggregation function, if multiple components are requested (Sum, Avg, Min, Max, Last).

values.description: Values of the requested device and channel.

componentId.description: Gets or sets the component id, can also be a csv list of component ids.

channelId.description: Gets or sets the channel id.

multiAggregate.description: Gets or sets the aggregation function, if multiple components are requested (Sum, Avg, Min, Max, Last).

gridFeedIn.description: Gets or sets the grid feed in.

gridConsumption.description: Gets or sets the grid consumption.

current.description: Gets or sets the current items.

totWhOutYesterday.description: Gets yesterdays energy of the  plant, sub plant or device.

specWhOutToday.description: Gets todays specific energy of the  plant, sub plant or device.

specWhOutYesterday.description: Gets yesterdays specific energy of the  plant, sub plant or device.

componentId.description: Unique identifier of the component, e.g. plantId, deviceId, etc. Multiple components can be passed as comma-separated list.

values.description: Values of the requested device and channel.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last parameter modification or creation

_links.description: Gets or sets the HATEOAS links for the current object

countryName.description: Country code where the plant is located in format ISO 3166 ALPHA-2.

currencyCode3.description: The ISO currency code according to ISO 4217.

city.description: City where the plant is located.

street.description: Street where the plant is located.

TermsOfUseDocResponse.description: Document for a terms of use.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique id of the document.

cultureName.description: Gets or sets the culture name of the document.

termsOfUseType.description: Gets or sets the type of the terms of use, e.g. DataPrivacy.

documentContent.description: Content of the terms of use document in html format.

cultureName.description: Gets or sets the culture name of the document.

termsOfUseType.description: Gets or sets the type of the terms of use, e.g. DataPrivacy.

confirmationId.description: Gets or sets the unique confirmation id.

activated.description: Activiation value indicating whether the user is activated or not.

identifier.description: Unique identifier/email address of the user.

cultureName.description: Culture Name see ISO standards [(ISO 639-1)-(3166-2)], e.g. "de-DE".

country.description: Country where the user lives in format ISO 3166 ALPHA-2.

zipCode.description: Zip code of the city where the user lives.
